website_summaries.verdict: Whether you are a Harry Potter fan, collector, or are shopping for a youngster who loves the books and films, this doll captures the essence of the beloved character.
pros: Earns praise for having details that make it look almost identical to the Harry Potter character of the iconic movies
Has numerous movable parts that make it easy to pose
Hogwarts uniform with  Gryffindor robe is one of the character's most popular looks
cons: At least one owner was disappointed that the doll's eyes appear to be more blue in color than green

customer_reviews.title: Harry Potter doll 12"
customer_reviews.text: This doll is wonderful for a Harry Potter fan! My 10 year old Harry Potter fan is a boy, and he has placed the figure...we don't call it a doll... :) on a shelf in his bookcase next to his Harry Potter books...just like book stores do! It is really an adorable doll and comes with the long black "robe" as well! A little girl who may not even know about Harry Potter would enjoy this cute fellow as well!
customer_reviews.author: shopper66

customer_reviews.title: There are two things missing from Harry Potter
customer_reviews.text: Harry Potter doll. Well he looks like Harry Potter facially. Outfit is very on mark. One thing wrong that I did not like is the plastic hair. I would have it realistic like. Second thing that I did not like is where is the scar? That’s a very important mark for Harry Potter. I might still buy it again. I like the way he looks.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Yes!! Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: The clothes fit my elf perfectly!! I used it for Harry Potter Christmas with Elf in the Shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Ahearn

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Very very good quality. All joints move .. nice outfit that is sewed well. Only grip is glasses don't stay on once they are taken off.
customer_reviews.author: JKellyz

customer_reviews.title: Life Like
customer_reviews.text: The Harry Potter doll is very life like. The clothing matches the early movies. Well worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Harry Potter Fans!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great deal and value. My sons wanted all the Harry Potter dolls for Christmas, I found the Draco one on clearance so I grabbed it when I saw it but most of the other ones in store were still around $24, so the price on here is much better. Great quality and it is going to make my little Harry Potter fan very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: As expected, looks like it's pic. My sister in law is going to love it! She collects these dolls, leaving them packing. The price was GREAT too compared to other dolls.

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made toy
customer_reviews.text: The details on these figures are very well done. Nice attention to clothing and accessories, but still durable for kids to play with. Great value for the money and my kids (ages 6-10) all play w/ the characters constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: I don't consider item brand new.
customer_reviews.text: Y item was not brand new. Box has been crushed opened and taped back shut. Not a good thing when you give a collector a gift in the box is destroyed.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Potter fans.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a fan of the films this figure was well worth the money. It did look light weight and flimsy but to my surprise it is still in one piece. Girls are not as rough with toys as boys are. I'm told the figure resides in the doll house with Elsa, (whoever he is) and is as good as when it came out of the packaging.

product_meta.title: Mattel Harry Potter Harry Potter Doll
product_meta.description: This film-inspired doll brings Harry Potter and his friends back to Hogwarts! Young fans can recreate their favorite scenes from the movies, or imagine their very own, with Harry Potter dolls. This Harry Potter doll looks just like his character in the iconic film series and comes dressed in his signature Hogwarts uniform, complete with a Gryffindor robe. With eleven "joints" -in the neck, shoulders, hips, knees, elbows and wrists -Harry Potter doll is ready for action storytelling and spellbinding poses! Doll comes with a personalized wand matching the one Harry uses on screen -perfect for casting spells and inspiring imaginative play. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: Fans and collectors will love recreating their favorite storylines from the movies and imagining their own!
Special details, like his iconic Scar and glasses, make Harry Potter doll look just like his character in the celebrated film series
His outfit is based on the signature Hogwarts uniform, with a Gryffindor robe and personalized wand that fans can use to help the young Wizard cast spells and charms
Harry Potter doll has eleven "joints" That allow for limitless posing possibilities and action storytelling on his Quest to defeat Lord Voldemort
Harry Potter and his friends are better together! Young fans can collect each of their favorite characters for even more fun and expanded play

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,358 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
